message: Or maybe I'm just used to stars being "favorites", not "I like this"
Like button like facebook or youtube for comments in topics. Sometimes I agree with someone but not enough to reply.
yea I suppose it is..
Think the star is meant to be the same concept...

They seem more pertinent though. I'm less likely to star something because it seems to effect statistics of something.. Stars given and star received are counted and it makes it seem like it could be used for a ranking system.. I guess I'm just too stingy with my stars.
i'd like favs and likes to be separate, perhaps
what about pickles?
i think each reply should have a clickable star, crescent moon and four-leaf clofer
and it should not be documented what any of them actually do
@georgalis Sorry, What is it?
I vote for this Idea  'Like button'
eventually the community will create conventions for each symbol
kind of like "poke" on facebook
above where i said "clofer" i meant to say "clover"
+1 for kitten icons
also, replying "+1" in a thread should star everything in a one-mile radius
user-definable fave icons could be interesting... also relates to the idea of users being able to define their own badges
instead of the site owners enacted by fiat
users coudl choose whether or not to accept the badges they qualify for
so only truly useful badges would end up being adopted by the community
now thinking about founding a social network optimized for emergent behavior
Perhaps a +1 and -1 button? :-)
There doesn't need to be a +/-  Convore is less Reddit / Digg, more of a traditional forum. As for 'Like' button, as already mentioned the star does exactly the same thing.
mob rule, even
yeah, i don't see convore implementing a ranking system.... that tends to lead to mob behavior
would be cool if you can make your own icons and others can share them.
@georgalis but of course icon tags only make sense if you can view them as a set. can I please see all the posts for which I have simultaneously selected a star, house & kitten? @Asshu  @djchall

@Asshu  @djchall @ericflo https://convore.com/feedback/brainstorming/78661/ https://convore.com/feedback/like-button/212831/ ambiguous icons are excellent, I'd like to have 256 of them.... also useful if half of them where only visible to the person that set them, if they where called tags, I'd like a few private ones.
